directions: Place watercress in a large bowl; top with tomatoes, onion, peanuts, lime juice, sesame seeds, garlic oil, fish sauce, and salt. Toss mixture well; let sit for flavors to blend, about 10 minutes.
ingredients: 3 limes, juiced, or more to taste
1/2 teaspoon salt, or more to taste
title: Refreshing Watercress Salad
